code: import React from"react";import{Grid}from"@material-ui/core";import BusinessCard from"./BusinessCard";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{hideOverflow:{margin:0,width:"100%"}};});export default function CardGrid(props){var classes=useStyles();console.log(props.data);return React.createElement(Grid,{container:true,direction:"column",justify:"flex-start",alignItems:"center",spacing:4,className:classes.hideOverflow},props.data.map(function(card){return React.createElement(Grid,{item:true,key:card.venue.id,xs:12,sm:6,md:4},React.createElement(BusinessCard,{venue:card.venue,checkins:card.checkins}));}));}
